Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In today's news people are concerned about the bulk billing crisis in Australia as clinics are no longer offering bulk billing to adult patients due to rising costs. The average cost for a 15-minute consultation is $40 on top of the Medicare rebate. The Australian Medical Association is urging the government to provide funding to address the issue. Meanwhile as the Albanese Government finalizes the federal budget the Treasurer warns of weak global economic growth but assures productive engagements with G20 IMF and World Bank.
